text: - [Narrator] Stellantis, a name famous

for 14 renowned automotive
brands and two mobility giants,
is at the forefront of innovation
in the Big Bang of automotive disruption,

shaping the new landscape
of connected mobility.
Tying together developers

in multiple R&D facilities
across the globe is

the ingenious Virtual
Engineering Workbench,
a cloud-enabled collaborative platform

that unites users in a
shared digital space.

On this episode of "All
Things Automotive,"
see how verification and validation
are streamlining the processes,

drastically cutting
down the onboarding time
for automotive engineers,
and getting better products to customers
faster than ever before.
